column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It's not as overwhelming as I expected- truly a pizza "pie". There's plenty of filling
column2: but wasn't a mouthful of tomato sauce. The dough is soft and chewy
column3: and the cheese is perfectly melted. It's not the most amazing pizza I've tasted in my life
column4: but no Chicago visit/life is complete without at least trying this famous slice/wedge!
